bibl.title: A Greek Papyrus Amulet from the Duke Collection with Biblical Excerpts. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: P. Duke Inv. 778 (known formerly as P. Robinson 41). Recto: Ps. 90 and Ps. 91. Verso: Mt. 6.9-13 (Lord's Prayer) and doxological formula. Provenance unknown, late VI / early VII. - Pp. 107-113: Appendix. Parallel Attestations in Greek Manuscripts (Papyri, Ostraca, Tablets etc.) from Late Antique and Early Medieval Egypt (to the 10th cent. A.D.): I. Psalm 90; - II. Psalm 91; - III. Lord's Prayer.
bibl.seg: LA'DA Csaba A. and Amphilochios PAPATHOMAS, A Greek Papyrus Amulet from the Duke Collection with Biblical Excerpts. Avec résumé en anglais.

P. Duke Inv. 778 (known formerly as P. Robinson 41). Recto: Ps. 90 and Ps. 91. Verso: Mt. 6.9-13 (Lord's Prayer) and doxological formula. Provenance unknown, late VI / early VII. - Pp. 107-113: Appendix. Parallel Attestations in Greek Manuscripts (Papyri, Ostraca, Tablets etc.) from Late Antique and Early Medieval Egypt (to the 10th cent. A.D.): I. Psalm 90; - II. Psalm 91; - III. Lord's Prayer.
